1: וְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>And if a soul</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>now if</n> תֶחֱטָ֗א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>sin</n> וְשָֽׁמְעָה֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and hear</n> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the voice</n> אָלָ֔ה <sup>423 </sup> <n>of swearing</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עֵ֔ד <sup>5707 </sup> <n>and [is] a witness</n> א֥וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>whether</n> רָאָ֖ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>he hath seen</n> א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> יָדָ֑ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>or known</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> ל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יַגִּ֖יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>[of it] if he do not utter</n> וְנָשָׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>[it] then he shall bear</n> עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>his iniquity</n>
2: א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>Or</n> נֶ֗פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>Or if a soul</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>if</n> תִּגַּע֮ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>touch</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> דָּבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>thing</n> טָמֵא֒ <sup>2931 </sup> <n>any unclean</n> אוֹ֩ <sup>176 </sup> <n>whether</n> בְנִבְלַ֨ת <sup>5038 </sup> <n>whether [it be] a carcase</n> חַיָּ֜ה <sup>2416 </sup> <n>beast</n> טְמֵאָ֗ה <sup>2931 </sup> <n>of an unclean</n> א֤וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בְּנִבְלַת֙ <sup>5038 </sup> <n>or a carcase</n> בְּהֵמָ֣ה <sup>929 </sup> <n>cattle</n> טְמֵאָ֔ה <sup>2931 </sup> <n>of unclean</n> א֕וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> בְּנִבְלַ֖ת <sup>5038 </sup> <n>or the carcase</n> שֶׁ֣רֶץ <sup>8318 </sup> <n>creeping things</n> טָמֵ֑א <sup>2931 </sup> <n>of unclean</n> וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <sup>5956 </sup> <n>and [if] it be hidden</n> מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and he</n> טָמֵ֖א <sup>2931 </sup> <n>from him he also shall be unclean</n> וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <sup>816 </sup> <n>and guilty</n>
3: א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>Or</n> כִ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> יִגַּע֙ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>Or if he touch</n> בְּטֻמְאַ֣ת <sup>2932 </sup> <n>the uncleanness</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> לְכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of whatever</n> טֻמְאָת֔וֹ <sup>2932 </sup> <n>whatsoever uncleanness</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִטְמָ֖א <sup>2930 </sup> <n>[it be] that a man shall be defiled</n> בָּ֑הּ וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <sup>5956 </sup> <n>withal and it be hid</n> מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָדַ֖ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>from him when he knoweth</n> וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <sup>816 </sup> <n>[of it] then he shall be guilty</n>
4: א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>Or</n> נֶ֡פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>Or if a soul</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> תִשָּׁבַע֩ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>swear</n> לְבַטֵּ֨א <sup>981 </sup> <n>pronouncing</n> בִשְׂפָתַ֜יִם <sup>8193 </sup> <n>with [his] lips</n> לְהָרַ֣ע ׀ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>to do evil</n> א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> לְהֵיטִ֗יב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>or to do good</n> לְ֠כֹל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> יְבַטֵּ֧א <sup>981 </sup> <n>shall pronounce</n> הָאָדָ֛ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>whatsoever [it be] that a man</n> בִּשְׁבֻעָ֖ה <sup>7621 </sup> <n>with an oath</n> וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <sup>5956 </sup> <n>and it be hid</n> מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> וְהוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָדַ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>from him when he knoweth</n> וְאָשֵׁ֖ם <sup>816 </sup> <n>[of it] then he shall be guilty</n> לְאַחַ֥ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>in one</n> מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n>
5: וְהָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>shall be when</n> יֶאְשַׁ֖ם <sup>816 </sup> <n>And it shall be when he shall be guilty</n> לְאַחַ֣ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>in one</n> מֵאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>of these</n> וְהִ֨תְוַדָּ֔ה <sup>3034 </sup> <n>of these [things] that he shall confess</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חָטָ֖א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>that he hath sinned</n> עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>shall also</n>

7: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> תַגִּ֣יע <sup>5060 </sup> <n>to bring</n> יָדוֹ֮ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>And if he</n> דֵּ֣י <sup>1767 </sup> <n>be not able</n> שֶׂה֒ <sup>7716 </sup> <n>a lamb</n> וְהֵבִ֨יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>then he shall bring</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲשָׁמ֜וֹ <sup>817 </sup> <n>his trespass</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חָטָ֗א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>which he hath committed</n> שְׁתֵּ֥י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>two</n> תֹרִ֛ים <sup>8449 </sup> <n>turtledoves</n> אֽוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> שְׁנֵ֥י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>or two</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>young</n> יוֹנָ֖ה <sup>3123 </sup> <n>pigeons</n> לַֽיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> לְחַטָּ֖את <sup>2403 </sup> <n>for a sin offering</n> וְאֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>and the other</n> לְעֹלָֽה׃ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>for a burnt offering</n>

15: נֶ֚פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>If a soul</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> תִמְעֹ֣ל <sup>4603 </sup> <n>commit</n> מַ֔עַל <sup>4604 </sup> <n>a trespass</n> וְחָֽטְאָה֙ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>and sin</n> בִּשְׁגָגָ֔ה <sup>7684 </sup> <n>through ignorance</n> מִקָּדְשֵׁ֖י <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in the holy things</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְהֵבִיא֩ <sup>935 </sup> <n>then he shall bring</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲשָׁמ֨וֹ <sup>817 </sup> <n>for his trespass</n> לַֽיהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אַ֧יִל <sup>352 </sup> <n>a ram</n> תָּמִ֣ים <sup>8549 </sup> <n>without blemish</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>against</n> הַצֹּ֗אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>out of the flocks</n> בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֛ <sup>6187 </sup> <n>with thy estimation</n> כֶּֽסֶף־ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> שְׁקָלִ֥ים <sup>8255 </sup> <n>by shekels</n> בְּשֶֽׁקֶל־ <sup>8255 </sup> <n>after the shekel</n> הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>of the sanctuary</n> לְאָשָֽׁם׃ <sup>817 </sup> <n>for a trespass offering</n>
16: וְאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חָטָ֨א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>for the harm</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>against</n> הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>that he hath done in the holy thing</n> יְשַׁלֵּ֗ם <sup>7999 </sup> <n>And he shall make amends</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֲמִֽישִׁתוֹ֙ <sup>2549 </sup> <n>the fifth part</n> יוֹסֵ֣ף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>and shall add</n> עָלָ֔יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>of</n> וְנָתַ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thereto and give</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>it unto the priest</n> וְהַכֹּהֵ֗ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>and the priest</n> יְכַפֵּ֥ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>shall make an atonement</n> עָלָ֛יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> בְּאֵ֥יל <sup>352 </sup> <n>for him with the ram</n> הָאָשָׁ֖ם <sup>817 </sup> <n>of the trespass offering</n> וְנִסְלַ֥ח <sup>5545 </sup> <n>and it shall be forgiven</n> לֽוֹ׃ פ
17: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>now if</n> נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>And if a soul</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תֶֽחֱטָ֔א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>sin</n> וְעָֽשְׂתָ֗ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and commit</n> אַחַת֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>any</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> מִצְוֹ֣ת <sup>4687 </sup> <n>by the commandments</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵעָשֶׂ֑ינָה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>of these things which are forbidden to be done</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָדַ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>though he wist</n> וְאָשֵׁ֖ם <sup>816 </sup> <n>[it] not yet is he guilty</n> וְנָשָׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and shall bear</n> עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>his iniquity</n>
18: וְ֠הֵבִיא <sup>935 </sup> <n>And he shall bring</n> אַ֣יִל <sup>352 </sup> <n>a ram</n> תָּמִ֧ים <sup>8549 </sup> <n>without blemish</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַצֹּ֛אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>out of the flock</n> בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <sup>6187 </sup> <n>with thy estimation</n> לְאָשָׁ֖ם <sup>817 </sup> <n>for a trespass offering</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>unto the priest</n> וְכִפֶּר֩ <sup>3722 </sup> <n>shall make an atonement</n> עָלָ֨יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>and the priest</n> עַ֣ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> שִׁגְגָת֧וֹ <sup>7684 </sup> <n>for him concerning his ignorance</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שָׁגָ֛ג <sup>7683 </sup> <n>wherein he erred</n> וְה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> יָדַ֖ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and wist</n> וְנִסְלַ֥ח <sup>5545 </sup> <n>[it] not and it shall be forgiven</n> לֽוֹ׃
19: אָשָׁ֖ם <sup>817 </sup> <n>It [is] a trespass offering</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אָשֹׁ֥ם <sup>816 </sup> <n>he hath certainly</n> אָשַׁ֖ם <sup>816 </sup> <n>trespassed</n> לַיהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>against the LORD</n> פ
